item.title: ps_crossselling - Display the bloc in shopping cart footer
item.description: ps_crossselling - Display the bloc in shopping cart footer Details Component : ps_crossselling Status : Approved Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-621 Steps Step Description Expected result In position tab add the crossselling module to the hook displayshoppincartfooter" and saved" Message should be displayed Go to FO and select a product FO and produdct page should be displayed Add the product in the cart Product should be added Go to the shopping cart and check the footer The block should be displayed
